attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it necessary for consumers to pay extra for a debit card transaction? I can't see the reason for this, yet more and more travel companies, such as low cost-carriers, hotels and car hire companies are adding this extra charge. This is really against the point of a debit card. The money is immediately taken out of your account and transferred across electronically, so where is the "administrative" element of this?
